thread.title: Watch Landon Donovan get pumped with USMNT fans by jumping off a taco truck and crowd surfing
thread.title_full: Watch Landon Donovan get pumped with USMNT fans by jumping off a taco truck and crowd surfing

title: Watch Landon Donovan get pumped with USMNT fans by jumping off a taco truck and crowd surfing
text:
Mar 24, 2017 at 2:14p ET 0Shares 
Landon Donovan confirmed that he is officially retired on Thursday afternoon. So what did he do on Thursday night? 
Jumped off a taco truck into the arms of some American Outlaws to check “crowd jump” and “crowd surf” off his bucket list. 
Donovan was in San Jose, Calif., where he’ll call the United States’ World Cup qualifier against Honduras (coverage begins at 9:30 p.m. ET on FS1) so he stopped by the American Outlaws night-before party. 
There, he got on top of a taco truck alongside Alexi Lalas and Rob Stone and gave a speech to the cheering U.S. fans, but you can’t just take the ladder off the truck. Not when you’re Landon Donovan. You gotta leap. 
Now it’s time to update Donovan’s resume: Played in three World Cups Leading goalscorer in MLS and U.S. history Most assists in MLS and U.S. history Six MLS Cups
